add.description: Add a new case-sentitive key and value to related data map. Key and Value can be templatized.

remove.description: Remove a case-sensitive key from related data map. Key and Value can be templatized.

update.description: Update case-sensitive existing key from related data map. Key and Value can be templatized.

replaceKeys.description: Replace case-sensitive existing key using the associated value. Value can be templatized.

removeKeys.description: Remove all keys matching these given regexp.

PatchOperation.title: Patch Operation
PatchOperation.description: PatchOperation represents atomic patch operations executable on a k/v map.
